name: Retrograde (itch) (Dan Butcher)
description:
Dodge, weave and BLAST your way through ten levels of arcade shooter action! Use the points you gain from destroying enemies to upgrade your ship as you progress through the stages, each more challenging than the last.

Retrograde will take you back to the early days of mobile phone gaming and was made as part of the Nokia 3310 Jam #4.

Controls:

  • WASD or arrow keys to move your ship and the cursor on the upgrade screen
  • SPACE to spend your points on the upgrade screen (also restarts the game if you get to the end)
  • ENTER to move on to the next level once you've chosen your upgrades
  • Nothing to fire! Your ship does that all by itself!

Big thanks to Trix for the sound effects and somepx for the fonts. The music was made using Serge Zaitsev's online Nokia Composer.
